addAll

public void addAll(uep.data.AddableDataSet dataSet)
Adds all phrases from source dataSet, which must be an NgramBook, to this NgramBook. User data associated with the added phrases, accessible via AbstractPhrase.getData(), is added by reference unless this NgramBook's PhraseBookValueAdapter does not copy it.

Specified by:
addAll in interface uep.data.AddableDataSet

add

public int add(PhraseInfo phraseInfo)
Adds a phrase to this NgramBook with null user data.

Specified by:
add in interface PhraseBook<INTERNAL,EXTERNAL>
Parameters:
phraseInfo - phrase to be added; phraseInfo.id is updated when the phrase is successfully added.
Returns:
PhraseBook.OK when successfully added, PhraseBook.ALREADY_EXISTS or PhraseBook.ERR otherwise.

get

public int get(AbstractToken[] toks,
               NBestResult result)
Description copied from interface: PhraseBook
Get PhraseInfo with the given tokens, or null. Tokens may either be specified fully by their TOKEN_ID, or by the following features: TOKEN_LC, TOKEN_LEMMA (taken into account when TOKEN_ID==-1). NBestResult will contain an array of found phrases and corresponding data like this: { items: [ phr1, phr2 ], scores: [0.5, 0.2], data:[obj1, obj2] } The representation of phrase depends on the implementation; e.g. for Trie implementations phr1,2 can be the last trie segment of found phrase etc.

Specified by:
get in interface PhraseBook<INTERNAL,EXTERNAL>
